319.movie_plot: A major heist goes off as planned, until bad luck and double crosses cause everything to unravel.

11.movie_plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

57.movie_plot: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

172.movie_plot: Producers Max Bialystock and Leo Bloom make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

225.movie_plot: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

299.movie_plot: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

26.movie_plot: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

18.movie_plot: When a street urchin vies for the love of a beautiful princess, he uses a genie's magic power to make himself off as a prince in order to marry her.

122.movie_plot: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

100.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

235.movie_plot: Take two rival television reporters: one handsome, one talented, both male. Add one Producer, female. Mix well, and watch the sparks fly.

213.movie_plot: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

29.movie_plot: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

139.movie_plot: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

1.movie_plot: A misogynistic and snobbish phonetics professor agrees to a wager that he can take a flower girl and make her presentable in high society.

210.movie_plot: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

193.movie_plot: A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?

104.movie_plot: An inventor spurns his city life to move his family into the jungles of Central America to make a utopia.

253.movie_plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

113.movie_plot: A romance writer sets off to Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure.

227.movie_plot: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works with a nuclear physicist to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican during one of the significant events within the church.

189.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

25.movie_plot: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

156.movie_plot: A naive man comes out into the world after spending 35 years in a nuclear fallout shelter.

184.movie_plot: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

278.movie_plot: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

233.movie_plot: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow Agent formerly believed to be dead.

93.movie_plot: A mute woman is sent to 1850s New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

3.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

127.movie_plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

95.movie_plot: A psychiatrist must cure a young patient that presents himself as Don Juan, the greatest lover in the world.

289.movie_plot: A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

21.movie_plot: The story of James Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to become a champion and an inspiration in the 1930s.

180.movie_plot: When a recently-deceased ghost couple find their now-vacant home invaded by an obnoxious family, they hire a sleazy ghost who gets rid of humans to help them.

134.movie_plot: A legendary fifteen-foot tall mountain gorilla named Joe is taken to an animal sanctuary in California by a zoologist and a young woman whom he grew up with. A poacher from the past returns to seek vengeance on him.

108.movie_plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home cause confusion.

124.movie_plot: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

146.movie_plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

54.movie_plot: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

281.movie_plot: Six guests are invited to a strange house and must cooperate with the staff to solve a murder mystery.

101.movie_plot: In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.

159.movie_plot: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

32.movie_plot: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.

182.movie_name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock (1984)
182.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

267.movie_name: Aladdin and the King of Thieves (1996)
267.movie_plot: When a street urchin vies for the love of a beautiful princess, he uses a genie's magic power to make himself off as a prince in order to marry her.

310.movie_plot: The love lives of two brothers, Mickey and Francis, interconnect as Francis cheats on his wife with Mickey's ex-girlfriend, while Mickey impulsively marries a stranger.

271.movie_plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

244.movie_plot: In San Francisco, a group of people discover the human race is being replaced one by one, with clones devoid of emotion.

89.movie_plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

260.movie_plot: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".

218.movie_plot: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

242.movie_plot: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend--both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

71.movie_plot: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

315.movie_plot: A recent high school graduate unsure of his future gets a summer job at the Flamingo beach club, and meets the charismatic Phil Brody.

240.movie_plot: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

116.movie_plot: Loretta Castorini, a bookkeeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

188.movie_plot: An ingenue insinuates herself into the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

166.movie_plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that he is not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

272.movie_plot: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.
